fullDescription.intro: This node copies or moves the files indicated by the selected URI column of the input table.
fullDescription.option:
Copy
Copy the files to a new location.
Move
Move/rename the files.
Column with the URI to the files.

From separate column
The target filenames are present in an URI column.
From source name
Use the sources filename and put them into the output directory.
Column with the URI where the files should be put.
The directory where the files will be put, if the from source name option is selected.

Overwrite
Overwrite existing files.
Abort
Abort the execution if a file already exists.

ports.inPort: Table that contains one or more URI columns.
ports.outPort: Input table with the URI of the new files appended. It will only be appended if the table does not already contain this information.
